recipe.name: Butter Chicken
recipe.description: Creamy, rich butter chicken with tender pieces in a tomato-based curry sauce
recipeIngredient: 2 lbs chicken breast, cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garam masala, turmeric, and chili powder for 30 minutes.
Heat butter in a large pan and saut√© onion until golden.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add marinated chicken and cook until browned on all sides.
Stir in tomato puree and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add heavy cream, season with salt, and simmer for 10 more minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

recipe.keywords: butter chicken, indian curry, chicken curry, creamy chicken
